featured.text: He preferred to edit his images carefully in his darkroom.
He made clear his dislike of images that had been improved by artificial light, darkroom effects, and even cropping.

definition.zh_def: 暗房是一個用於處理和印刷照片的房間，通常是完全不透光的。
definition.en_def: A darkroom is a room used for processing and printing photographs, typically completely lightproof.
definition.example: The photographer spent hours in the darkroom developing his film.
